title: Yu-Gi-Oh!: Season 3, Vol. 5 - The Final Face-Off
description: The fate of the duel and the world hands in the balance with the finale of the Battle City Tournament! Yugi, Joey, Kaiba or Marik? Which one will emerge as the Battle City Champion? Contains 5 exciting episdes.
